name: Fix My Car: Classic Muscle Car
name_original: Fix My Car: Classic Muscle Car
description:
Have you ever wanted to fix-up a car? Complete one classic car while attending to over 30 odd-jobs by discovering parts, solving car issues, and using objects you find throughout the garage to fix your car. This is an ad-free game combining the Room Escape and Hidden Objects styles into one great app. You'll find it really entertaining even if you don't know a thing about cars.

This is a full version app which includes step-by-step walkthroughs (with hints) that will push you in the correct direction, if you ask for it.As for your game progress, the game will auto-save your every move so you can always undo a step or take a break.

Please do not spoil the fun for others by posting puzzle solutions in the comments. Instead, come and find us (FireRabbit) on Facebook.
